description.S1: A labcoat by the name of Jameson is missing.

blurb.B1: You will obtain this quest after landing in Roseway and entering the town.
blurb.B2: Find and talk to Anton Crane,
blurb.B3: and he will mention he left his protege at the lab during the commotion.
blurb.B4: Accept to rescue the labcoat to begin the quest.

description.S1: Anton sent Jameson to Auntie Cleo's old Aunti-Biotics Lab,
description.S2: just down the road south of Roseway.
description.S3: Make sure he isn't raptidon chow.

blurb.B1: Exit the town toward Roseway Gardens,
blurb.B2: and defeat the Raptidon that attack you as you approach Auntie-Biotics Lab 0013.
blurb.B3: in the large office where you fought the Raptidons,
blurb.B4: a locked door can be opened with Cleo Lab Office Keycard,
blurb.B7: you can go in and talk to Jameson.
blurb.B8: He recognizes you and asks you what you're doing here.
blurb.B9: Tell him Anton sent you and he'll complain that Anton is always double-checking everything he does.
blurb.B10: Jameson says that Anton does not care about him and instead just wants the precursors that he is holding.
blurb.B11: You can bring up that employee death would look back for Anton,
blurb.B12: ask him for the item to test the theory, or just get going.
blurb.B13: Tell him about employee death: You will get 8250xp and Jameson will run off

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Hours ago, a group of vicious malcontents fell upon us. Shot up our labs and loosed our research subjects, the raptidons.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: If those cretins get their hands on my research… well. They'll need not kill me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Remove the cretins, retrieve the research. Check. You want I should handle your raptidon problem?

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Yes - but don't kill the mother if it's avoidable, we've need of her to replenish our stocks. I think there's gas in the lab somewhere that can be used to put them out.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: The research is in the safe in my office - you'll have need of my code, and keycard.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: The lab's entrance is in the side of a hill, you can't miss it if you just follow the road. You'll pass by the town's original... by the Grand Architect. Jameson... he's in the old lab...

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: My protégé - I sent him to retrieve some metabolic precursors. And I forgot him.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sounds like it was chaos. You should give yourself a break.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You left him to die. Should be ashamed of yourself.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: You don't understand. He was my responsibility - all of the people stationed here were - ARE, regardless of their thinking on the matter.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: If he has died... too many have been lost. Too many black marks against my name. And far too much paperwork.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Don't like you much, but I'll look into this further and decide what to do.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Don't you think it weighs on me? He was my responsibility! All of them were - ARE, regardless of their thinking on the matter.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: That would surely lighten the weight on my conscience, as I am held to account for the wellbeing of every scientist here.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Too many have been lost. Too many black marks against my name, as it were. And far too much paperwork.
